item.title: By: Mannox
item.dc:creator: Mannox
item.description:
Wow. We got a couple of scammers posting to your Blog Foton! Who else but a scammer would bash the victim. I mean how is it the players fault? ScamsAlot advertises a high end Enchantment...you put your item to be enchanted in the non-trade box and pay the man then he does a lower enchantment.
You guys are on crack if you think that is the player's fault. Who in their right mind would enchant an item without payment first? You do that then the enchanter gets scammed by doing enchantments for free. So I guess the answer to go with your fucked up view is to not deal with anyone outside those you know? You two are fucked up plain and simple.
The GMs are there to insure the playability of the game. Assholes like ScamsAlot ruin that for the rest of us honest people. I personally have never been scammed but it enrages me that 2 scammers like G_RAM and Graham would have the stupidity to try and blame the victim.
I think the scammer should be banned permanently and they should flag his CC# so that he can't get another account.
